subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Diving (Sports Event)
lead_paragraph: Christina Loukas has become the second member of the United States diving team to earn a berth to the Beijing Games, winning the three-meter springboard Saturday at the Olympic trials in Indianapolis.
snippet: Christina Loukas has become the second member of the United States diving team to earn a berth to the Beijing Games, winning the three-meter springboard Saturday at the Olympic trials in Indianapolis.
